allProjects.name: instagram
allProjects.descripe: A site that simulates the Instagram application. The user can create an account, add and remove a post, comment on the post, edit and delete it.

allProjects.name: E-Commerce
allProjects.descripe: a dynamic E-Commerce platform built with Angular, designed for seamless, responsive experiences on any device.

allProjects.name: MOVIES
allProjects.descripe: A single page application to display a group of movies and series in a smooth way, each of which contains a group of details such as the picture, name and actors.

allProjects.name: Yummy-food
allProjects.descripe: A website that displays meals for each country. The user can search for the meal by its name or by the name of the country, and he can also get the method of preparation

allProjects.name: copy facebook
allProjects.descripe: A trial version of the Facebook website using HTML and CSS - the goal of the site is to demonstrate the power of the two languages ​​in building a visually attractive website without using any frameworks

allProjects.name: X_O Game
allProjects.descripe: A pure OOP project using JS, a simulation of the game XO. Players can be identified before the match starts, and victory can be achieved in three ways

allProjects.name: Question App

allProjects.name: medliab
allProjects.descripe: project that I created using Framework Bootstrap. I focused on using the ready-made templates it provides to create a simple, visually attractive website.

allProjects.name: mealify
allProjects.descripe: A simple website that simulates a cooking show, its goal is to showcase the power of HTML and CSS only in building an attractive website, without using any frameworks.

allProjects.name: Accessory store
allProjects.descripe: static site for girls' accessories that aims to demonstrate the power of Bootstrap in placing images on the site in an organized manner
